title: BlackBat
blurb: Bitcoin trading algorithms and tooling designed to increase long-term bitcoin accumulation using disciplined, auditable strategies.
description: BlackBat is a research and execution toolkit focused on accumulation-first algorithmic strategies. It includes volatility harvesting strategies, dynamic dollar-cost-averaging schedulers, liquidity-aware limit order routers, and hedged position sizing. Emphasis on auditability, backtest reproducibility, on-chain settlement flow, and safe defaults for risk-limited execution.
